titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1076) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the incentives for the construction and renovation of public schools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Carson (OK). Petition No: 107-1.

bill.summary: 5/23/2001--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 1076 (tax incentives for public school construction and renovation).
